Kansas City Job Search Tip
Major employers in Kansas include Learjet, Sprint, Goodyear Tire and Rubber Company, Applebee's, Koch Industries and the Department of Defense. The highest paid professionals in Kansas are Anesthesiologists, Doctors and Surgeons, and Air Traffic Controllers. According to America's Career InfoNet, the most job openings in Kansas are for Cashiers, Retail Salespeople, and Food Service Workers.
Kansas at a Glance:
Unemployment Rate: 4.7%
2005 Per Capita Income: $32,836
Largest Cities: Wichita, Overland Park, Kansas City, Topeka, Olathe
Minimum Hourly Wage: $2.65
